attributes.action: Hazard pay for "key workers" from food and drink industry
attributes.additional_details: Pay 50% from gross of each one to the workers that are doing a great job on preventions rules
attributes.background: Discuss hazard pay to the companies categorized  with key workers, as food and drink companies like factories and supermarkets

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
